title: MOVE IN READY !! MAKE IT YOURS TODAY !!🔒😍🏡🔑
posting_body: This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 694 Sq.
Pottery Creek is a brand-new apartment community in Port Orchard, WA that offers high end studios, 1, 2 & 3-bedroom apartment homes.
Here at Pottery Creek, we strive to make our community top tier.
Some of the community amenities we offer are a 24/7 Fitness Area, On-site Dog Park, Playground, 24/7 Emergency Maintenance & more!
Conveniently located 20 minutes from the Southworth Ferry and right next to HWY 16, the possibilities for shopping, food, and fun are endless!

Whether you are interested in a studio or a 3-bedroom home, each of our spacious floorplans comes fully equipped with a full-size washer and dryer, efficient stainless-steel appliances and a private patio or balcony for your comfort & convenience!
Love where you live at Pottery Creek!
Contact our friendly leasing team to set up your tour today!

New Stainless-Steel Appliances, Modern Soft Close Drawers & Cabinets, Magnificent White Speckled Quartz Countertops, Extra Storage, Cable/WIFI Ready, Spacious Gourmet Kitchens, Ceiling Fans, Hardwood Floors, Full Size Washer/Dryers in Home

Private Patio/Balcony, Fenced On-Site Pet Park, Resident Clubhouse, Planned Resident Events, Covered Parking, Playground, 24/7 Emergency Maintenance, 24/7 Fitness Center, Package Acceptance, Close to HWY 16, Grocery & Coffee, Brand New Community, Secure Private Garages, Near Public Transportation, EV Charging Stations
Household income of at least 2.5x rent
